parameter.name: courseId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the course that discussion created.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: The title of the discussion.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: The discussion message.

parameter.name: discussionType
parameter.description: The type of discussion.

parameter.name: published
parameter.description: Whether this topic is published.

parameter.name: delayedPostAt
parameter.description: The discussion will not publish untill given date time.

parameter.name: lockAt
parameter.description: The topic will be scheduled to lock at the provided date time.

parameter.name: podcastEnabled
parameter.description: Whether topic will have an associated podcast feed.

parameter.name: podcastHasStudentPosts
parameter.description: Whether podcast will include posts from students.

parameter.name: requireInitialPost
parameter.description: Whether the user respond to other replies until that user has made an initial reply.

parameter.name: isAnnouncement
parameter.description: Whether this topic is an announcement.

parameter.name: positionAfter
parameter.description: List position of the discussion.

parameter.name: groupCategoryId
parameter.description: The group id to add this discussion.

parameter.name: assignmentName
parameter.description: The name of the assignment related to discussion.

parameter.name: assignmentPosition
parameter.description: The position of this assignment in the group when displaying assignment lists.

parameter.name: assignmentSubmissionTypes
parameter.description: List of supported submission types for the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentAllowedExtensions
parameter.description: Allowed extensions if submission types includes online upload.

parameter.name: assignmentTurnitinEnabled
parameter.description: Applies when the Turnitin plugin is enabled for a course.

parameter.name: assignmentTurnitinSettings
parameter.description: Settings to send along to turnitin.

parameter.name: assignmentIntegrationData
parameter.description: Data related to third party integrations.

parameter.name: assignmentIntegrationId
parameter.description: The Unique ID from third party integrations.

parameter.name: assignmentPeerReviews
parameter.description: whether or not peer reviews will be turned on for the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentAutomaticPeerReviews
parameter.description: Whether peer reviews will be assigned automatically by Canvas.

parameter.name: assignmentNotifyOfUpdate
parameter.description: Whether canvas send a notification to students.

parameter.name: assignmentGroupCategoryId
parameter.description: The assignment will become a group assignment assigned to the group.

parameter.name: assignmentGradeGroupStudentsIndividually
parameter.description: If Group assignment, Teachers have the options to grade students individually.

parameter.name: assignmentExternalToolTagAttributes
parameter.description: Hash of attributes if submission types is external tool.

parameter.name: assignmentPointsPossible
parameter.description: The maximum points possible on the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentGradingType
parameter.description: The strategy used for grading the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentDueAt
parameter.description: The due date and time of the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentLockAt
parameter.description: The date and time of the assignment is locked.

parameter.name: assignmentUnlockAt
parameter.description: The date and time of the assignment is unlocked.

parameter.name: assignmentDescription
parameter.description: The assignment's description.

parameter.name: assignmentAssignmentGroupId
parameter.description: The assignment group id to put the assignment in.

parameter.name: assignmentMuted
parameter.description: Whether this assignment is muted.

parameter.name: assignmentAssignmentOverrides
parameter.description: List of overrides for the assignment.

parameter.name: assignmentOnlyVisibleToOverrides
parameter.description: Whether this assignment is only visible to overrides.

parameter.name: assignmentPublished
parameter.description: Whether this assignment is published.

parameter.name: assignmentGradingStandardId
parameter.description: The grading standard id to set for the course.
